name: Wireless Diagnostics Monitor File
summary: A WDMON file contains Wi-Fi performance scan results captured by Wireless Diagnostics, an app bundled with macOS used to analyze a user's network performance. It stores information about the connection of a network to the Internet, which includes the data transfer rate and signal quality, over a specified period of time.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: WDMON file open in Apple Wireless Diagnostics 1
images.alt: WDMON file open in Apple Wireless Diagnostics 1
